summary: This mod adds to the game realistic behavior for a player when he needs to rest and sleep,by adding yawning sound effect and visual effect of blurring the screen.
descriptionHtml:
Realistic Sleep
---------------------
After Destroying dragons and evil spirits, bandits,Vampires,but there is a limit,sooner or later your hero rest and you are looking for a place to sleep,but ... If your hero is tired and wants to sleep,why he does not show any signs that it is time to sleep?

- This mod adds to the game realistic behavior for a player when he needs to rest and sleep,by adding yawning sound effect and visual effect of blurring the screen.

1. After 13 - 14 hours of game time, your player starts to get tired and start yawning, this is the first sign of fatigue and sleep and needs to go to sleep.

2.If you still will not sleep after the player started to yawn, then after 2-3 hours blur effect will be displayed in the eyes of player along with a yawn Sound effect.

3.if you still not willing to sleep, then even after 3-4 hours, the player will begin to stumble and dozing until you find a bed to sleep.

Yawning sound for male and female characters are different.

This mod doesn't affects any skills and values of player just adds sound and visual effects to player.
